name: Wobble! (Owez)
description:
Hello Guys! This is my first game that I made for fun but I wanted to share it with you :D

Wobble! is a fast-paced dodging game that involved a very brave piece of jelly (or jello if your in America :P) vs massively oversized spoons! Hope You Enjoy! Change-log below:

1.3.7:

+Options Screen

+Ability To Mute Audio

+Controls Tab!

+Bigger Resolution (768x768, not 512x512)
